title: Creating a virtualised list in vanilla JS
excerpt:
Creating a virtual list component from the ground up was both a challenging and enlightening experience. In this post, I'll share what I learned throughout the process — from performance optimizations to rendering tricks and everything in between.

---

## 🧠 Why I Decided to Build My Own

I initially considered using an existing library like `react-window` or `react-virtualized`, but I wanted to really understand how virtual lists work under the hood.
